title: DevOps
subtext: Bridging the gap between development and operations
author: Buzzpy

description.title: DevOps
texts: DevOps is a set of practices that combines software development (Dev) and IT operations (Ops). It aims to shorten the systems development life cycle and provide continuous delivery with high software quality.

DevOps is about fostering a culture of collaboration between teams that traditionally worked in silos, particularly development and operations teams. By using automation tools and continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines, DevOps enables faster, more reliable software delivery.
